entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
